poolsScreen.title: Easily deposit your assets.
poolsScreen.noticeDeposit: You must deposit LP and also complete LP staking for rewards to accrue.
poolsScreen.noticeWithdraw: Fee rewards will be automatically added to your withdrawal. You must both unstake and withdraw LP for your asset to be displayed in My Assets.

swapScreen.title: Swap for any asset you want.

myAssetScreen.title: List of my assets that are participating in liquidity provision.

managementScreen.title: List of my assets that are participating in liquidity provision.

layerPopup.depositNotice1: Be sure to check the deposit address every time you make a deposit before sending the asset.
layerPopup.depositNotice2: When depositing, we recommend depositing the entire asset after completing the small deposit test.
layerPopup.qrcode1: Scan address with QR code menu on withdrawal screen
layerPopup.withdrawPlaceholder: Enter the address to which the asset will be sent.
layerPopup.correctAddress: Please enter the correct withdrawal address.
layerPopup.delay: Withdrawal may be delayed depending on the mainnet situation.
layerPopup.recover: It is impossible to recover any asset loss caused by incorrect input of the deposit address.
layerPopup.rewards1: We do not withdraw the currently supplied liquidity tokens from the pool, we only receive the distributed rewards.
layerPopup.rewards2: After completing the transaction, you can check the rewards in your wallet.

announcement.subtitle: When exchanging or depositing assets in a liquidity pool, there are possible risks.
announcement.message1: All assets identified in the interface are self-registered tokens on the Klaytn Chain without individual screening and do not guarantee their safety. Users must carefully check the token-related information before making an asset exchange or deposit before making a transaction.
announcement.message2: When an asset is exchanged, the asset price applied to the user may fluctuate significantly depending on the size per transaction, the amount of assets currently waiting in the pool (percentage), and changes in the real-time deposit and withdrawal of the pool.
announcement.message3: Due to price fluctuations, users may be deposited or withdrawn from the pool at an unexpected price and rate, and if there is a significant difference from the price at the time of depositing into the pool, a loss may occur compared to holding the asset in general.
announcement.message4: Any figures displayed on the site are estimates and do not guarantee the timeliness, suitability or accuracy of the information.
announcement.agreement: I confirm that I fully understand the risk factors and agree to use the service.
announcement.alertMessage: After checking the notices, please complete the agreement.

network.title: Change Network
